sentence.Network_en: The railway station smelt powerfully of cats and drains.
sentence.Network_cn: 火车站上有冲鼻的猫味和臭水沟味。

sentence.Network_en: Murphy's powerfully spoken Oedipus is an autocrat of iconic grandeur.
sentence.Network_cn: 墨菲激情演绎的俄狄浦斯王是位圣像般威严的独裁者。

sentence.Network_en: He is described as a strong, powerfully-built man of 60.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被描述成一个强壮的、肌肉发达的60岁老人。

list.abs: the Rough , Tough World Of Rugby To the uninitiated , rugby is a game in which a bunch of powerfully built men throw themselves at one another in pursuit of an oval ball .在外行的眼中，橄榄球赛只不过是一大群身材健壮的男人相互冲撞推挤，为了一颗椭圆形的球你争我夺。

A bulldozer moves slowly but powerfully across the land ., 推土机行驶缓慢 , 但强有力的碾过地面.
delight filled every bosom , for they saw that he was powerfully sympathetic .每人心中都洋溢着欢乐，因为他们看到，他极富同情心。

entry.tran: 有权力的；有势力的；有影响力的
entry.def: A powerful person or organization is able to control or influence people and events.

example.ex: You're a powerful man — people will listen to you.
example.tran: 你是有影响力的人，大家会听你的。

example.ex: ...Russia and India, two large, powerful countries.
example.tran: 两大强国，俄罗斯和印度

entry.def: You say that someone's body is powerful when it is physically strong.

example.tran: 汉斯活动了一下他那强健的肌肉。

example.ex: It's such a big powerful dog.
example.tran: 它是一条如此强壮的大狗。

entry.tran: （机器）大功率的；强效的；高效能的
entry.def: A powerful machine or substance is effective because it is very strong.

example.ex: The more powerful the car the more difficult it is to handle.
example.tran: 汽车的功率越大，就越难驾驭。
功能强大的计算机系统

entry.def: A powerful smell is very strong.

example.ex: There was a powerful smell of stale beer.
example.tran: 有一种呛人的过期啤酒味。

example.ex: ...tiny creamy flowers with a powerful scent.
example.tran: 散发浓香的淡黄色小花

entry.def: A powerful voice is loud and can be heard from a long way away.

example.ex: At that moment Mrs. Jones's powerful voice interrupted them, announcing a visitor.
example.tran: 就在那一刻，琼斯夫人响亮的声音打断了他们，说有人来访。

entry.tran: （文章、演讲或艺术品）极具感染力的，有震撼力的
entry.def: You describe a piece of writing, speech, or work of art as powerful when it has a strong effect on people's feelings or beliefs.

example.ex: ...Bleasdale's powerful 11-part drama about a corrupt city leader.
example.tran: 布利兹戴尔创作的关于一个腐败市领导的极具感染力的电视剧，共有11集

example.ex: ...one of the world's most powerful and moving operas, Verdi's 'Otello'.
example.tran: 威尔第创作的《奥泰罗》，世界最具感染力、最动人的歌剧之一

sentences.sentence: "the federal government replaced the powerfully pro-settler Sir Godfrey Huggins with the even tougher and more determined ex-trade unionist"

means.word_mean: 2. in a manner having a powerful influence;

sentences.sentence: "Clytemnestra's ghost crying in the night for vengeance remained most potently in the audience's mind"

auth_sentence.content: It's a heartbreaking story, very powerfully dramatised here.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's a heartbreaking story, very powerfully dramatised here.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's a heartbreaking story, very powerfully dramatised here.

auth_sentence.content: Music can have a powerfully subliminal effect.
auth_sentence.res_content: Music can have a powerfully subliminal effect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Music can have a powerfully subliminal effect.

auth_sentence.content: They have to resonate powerfully with them.
auth_sentence.res_content: They have to resonate powerfully with them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They have to resonate powerfully with them.

sentences.en: He felt himself so powerfully attracted to the scientific ideal.
sentences.cn: 他感到自己被这一科学理想十分强烈地吸引住了。

sentences.en: Never before had he felt himself so powerfully attracted to the idea.
sentences.cn: 他从没有像现在这样热衷于这个想法。
